title: Kazakhstan and Sri Lankan leaders hold bilateral talks
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva President Mahinda Rajapaksa who is on a three-day official visit to Kazakhstan met his counterpart President Nursultan Nazarbayev yesterday morning (20 November) for bilateral talks. President Nazarbayev welcomed his counterpart with a military guard of honour prior to the discussion….
